data.name: Recovery of an MMO Junkie: You and I, and Me and You
data.short_description: Sakurai, now sure that Moriko is indeed Hayashi, finds himself hesitating over playing online with Hayashi. Sakurai decides to continuing playing as if not knowing who Hayashi is, but finds himself wavering when Hayashi talks so happily about Sakurai. At the same time, Koiwai decides to give the gam

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
